How we work

We will set an appointment with you to inspect the installation area in Burgersdorp and confirm that it would be the best-suited location. The inspection is free of charge as we also donâ€™t charge call-out fees for any other plumbing-related repair or installation. Once we have confirmed the best-suited location we will send you an invoice and we will set an installation appointment date. We will then do the installation and issue you with a certificate of compliance.

How this system works

Cold water enters the geyser. Because the water is cold, the water will lay at the bottom of the geyser. At this point, it will be drawn into the inlet section of the manifold of the Solar Tubes. Once this happens the Solar Tubes will heat up the water and the water will automatically move upwards through the tubes into the geyser. After a short period, a stream is created by the water entering the manifold of the Solar system, and thus convections take place where a constant stream of water is flowing through the system. In this manner, the water will continue to move inside the geyser constantly warming the water and keeping it at a warm temperature.

The benefits of this system

The benefits of this system are as follows:

No mechanical parts are needed for the system to work

No mechanical parts are needed for the system to work. This means that no pump will be required to drive the water from the geyser into the tubes, and back. The benefit here is less repair costs over a period of time.

The geyser can produce hot water even if no sunlight is present

The geyser can produce hot water even if no sunlight is present. Because this system provides a booster element that will still use Eskom electricity as and when needed to heat the water.

Huge savings on electricity

Huge savings on electricity. As this system is highly efficient in heating water. Because the largest consuming item of electricity on your premises is your geyser. And the fact that the water gets heated by the sun, results in the booster element being used fewer times in order to heat up the water.

Increase in the value of your property

Increase the value of your property in Burgersdorp. Making your premises more attractive to potential buyers. This is surely the most beneficial upgrade to your premises in order to increase the value of your property.
